testimonials.description: Feedback from partners who have accompanied ZINITEK over the years.

hero.description: ZINITEK provides optimized solutions for CNC machining, mold making, and automation. We combine hands-on technical experience with strict control processes to ensure quality at the most competitive cost.

services.hub_description: Comprehensive solutions from mechanical machining to factory automation with Japanese engineering and optimized costs.
services.meta_desc: High-quality CNC machining, mold making, and automation solutions following Japanese standards at ZINITEK.

about_summary.description: With a solid technical foundation and modern machinery systems, ZINITEK is proud to be a reliable partner in the precision engineering field in Vietnam.
about_summary.feature1_desc: Technical consulting helps reduce material costs by 20%.
about_summary.feature2_desc: Ultra-low tolerances, meeting the most stringent standards.
about_summary.feature3_desc: On-time delivery with a rigorous control process.

featured_projects.description: Demonstrating ZINITEK's machining quality and hands-on experience through actual products delivered to major partners.

news_section.description: Stay updated with mechanical technology trends and practical machining experience from the ZINITEK team.

about_page.meta_title: About ZINITEK | Precision Machining & Automation Experts
about_page.header_top_desc: A journey of strong growth, establishing international standards in the precision engineering sector in Vietnam.
about_page.header_desc: ZINITEK is not just a production facility; it is a hub for breakthrough technical thinking. We were founded with the mission to bridge the gap between design concepts and actual products through the most advanced CNC machining and automation solutions.
about_page.description_2: Equipped with modern machinery and a team of engineers with extensive practical experience, ZINITEK has been a strategic partner for businesses from Japan, Korea, and multi-national corporations.
about_page.commitment: We commit to: Absolute Precision - Timelines beyond expectations - Optimized costs. ZINITEK accompanies businesses in elevating the global production value chain.

footer.description: A reliable partner in precision mechanical machining, mold design, and automation following Japanese standards.
footer.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to receive the latest technology news and offers.
footer.address_label: My Phuoc 3 Industrial Park, Ben Cat, Binh Duong
